mapper.select: /* 아이디 로그인 */ SELECT USER_ID ,USER_NAME ,PW_ERR_CNT ,PROFILE_PATH ,IFNULL(STAT_MSG, '') AS STAT_MSG FROM USER_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}

SELECT UF.USER_ID , UF.FRIEND_ID , UM.USER_NAME AS FRIEND_NAME , IFNULL(UM.STAT_MSG, '') AS FRIEND_STAT_MSG , UF.BOOKMARK_YN , DATE_FORMAT(UF.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT FROM USER_FRIEND AS UF INNER JOIN USER_MASTER AS UM ON (UF.FRIEND_ID = UM.USER_ID) WHERE UF.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT USER_ID , USER_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT , DATE_FORMAT(MOD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS MOD_DT , PROFILE_PATH , IFNULL(STAT_MSG, '') AS STAT_MSG FROM USER_MASTER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT 'Y' AS EXIST_YN ,USER_ID FROM USER_MASTER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
